serverInfo.name: xAI-Models
serverInfo.title: xAI Models
serverInfo.description: Provides access to xAI Grok models and related documentation. Includes listings of language, image, and general-purpose models, as well as the official Grok 4 system card detailing architecture, safety evaluations, and alignment principles. Useful for exploring available xAI model capabilities and understanding their design and responsible deployment context.
